description: Orphaned at a young age, Naoto was found suffering from amnesia after the extremely violent murder of her parents, which also resulted in an iconic X-shaped scar across the middle of her chest. She was taken in, raised and trained by a swordsman whom she believed to be her parents` murderer. He named her Naoto after someone else in his own past, but never revealed his own name to her.
name: Fuyumine Naoto
